excerpt: "Over-fitting and imbalanced data are common pitfalls when you build machine learning models. By default, Azure Machine Learning's automated machine learning provides charts and metrics to help you identify these risks, and implements best practices to help mitigate them. Over-fitting in machine learning occurs when a model fits the training ..."
